summary:
Makes edges pop out, gives the visuals a crisp, \"hyper reality\" look to them.

Shader Mod
descriptionHtml:
Makes edges pop out, gives the visuals a crisp, \"hyper reality\" over sharpened look to the game.
I have provided as many pictures as I can so you can get a good idea of what to expect.

One downside is that you will notice fonts do not look very crisp, I recommend trying a few different custom fonts as this cannot be avoided.

Installation: Place all files provided in the folder where TESV.exe is located.
Please Note: You may need to run Skyrim as an Administrator on Windows7 (IF the game crashes on startup)

Uninstall: Delete them as you would to remove the effect.

Hope you like it! I pretty much use it all the time, so I thought I\'d share it.
author: Manny
